column4: Well, I've got a Canon PIXMA IP4000 that I just hooked up, grabbed from a PC house, worked perfectly fine, and after hooking it up, finding the right driver, everything seems fine...but it's printing things in the top right corner, as if the paper was 4x6 post card or something, even when printing multiple pages, it just uses the top left area and makes everything tiny
sorry I can't help you really, but Canon's are one of the worst printer brands for Linux support from my experience
hope you get it sorted out, sorry I couldn't help more
